name: Neutralize Poison, Greater
components: V, S, M/DF (a lump of charcoal)
text: This spell functions as neutralize poison, except as noted here. You automatically succeed at all caster level checks to neutralize any poisons affecting the target creature. The spell also reverses all instantaneous or permanent effects caused by poisons, such as temporary ability damage or permanent ability drain (it does not heal ability drain caused by anything other than poison, however). If you use the spell to neutralize the poison in a poisonous creature or object, the duration is 1 hour per level rather than 10 minutes per level. If the spell is cast on a creature, the creature can negate the effect by succeeding at a Will saving throw.
components_zh: 语言，姿势，材料/法器（一块木炭）
text_zh: 这种法术能起到中和毒素的作用，除了这里提到的。在中和任何影响到目标生物毒素的施法者等级检定中，你自动获得成功。法术还可以逆转所有的瞬间或永久的影响，如暂时的属性伤害或永久性的属性吸取（但是，法术不能治癒由其他除了毒药以外的任何事物引起的属性吸取）。如果你使用法术来中和一个有毒生物或物品上的毒素，持续时间是1小时每等级，而不是每等级10分钟。如果法术被释放在一个生物上，生物可以通过一次成功的意志豁免检定来无视效果。
